<Heading
  as={'h1'}

  children={'allOf with Deep Merging'}
></Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={'get'}
  path={'/allof-deep-merging'}
  context={'endpoint'}
></MethodEndpoint>

Schema:

```yaml
allOf:
  - type: object
    properties:
      deepProp:
        type: object
        properties:
          innerProp1:
            type: string
  - type: object
    properties:
      deepProp:
        type: object
        properties:
          innerProp2:
            type: number
```

<ParamsDetails parameters={undefined}></ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema title={'Body'} body={undefined}></RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}

  responses={{
    '200': {
      description: 'Successful response',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {
            allOf: [
              {
                type: 'object',
                properties: {
                  deepProp: {
                    type: 'object',
                    properties: { innerProp1: { type: 'string' } },
                  },
                },
              },
              {
                type: 'object',
                properties: {
                  deepProp: {
                    type: 'object',
                    properties: { innerProp2: { type: 'number' } },
                  },
                },
              },
            ],
